intro.title: Welcome to Anse Marcel
intro.description: Nestled on the northeast coast of Saint Martin, Anse Marcel is a horseshoe-shaped bay sheltered from the winds, offering calm and crystal-clear waters. It's the perfect place for a peaceful vacation away from the tourist crowds.

beach.title: Anse Marcel Beach
beach.description: A white sand beach lined with coconut palms, with calm and shallow turquoise waters. Perfect for families and snorkeling enthusiasts. Nearby coral reefs are home to colorful marine life.

marina.title: The Marina
marina.description: Anse Marcel Marina welcomes yachts and pleasure boats from around the world. You'll also find restaurants, bars and boutiques facing the sea.

items.title: Snorkeling & Diving
items.description: Explore the seabed rich in corals and tropical fish.

items.title: Kayak & Paddle
items.description: Rent a kayak or paddle to explore the bay and its hidden coves.

items.title: Hiking
items.description: Take the trail to Happy Bay, a wild beach accessible on foot.

items.title: Boat Excursions
items.description: Embark from the marina to Tintamarre, Pinel or Anguilla.

restaurants.title: Where to Eat
restaurants.description: The marina offers several restaurants overlooking the boats: French, Creole and international cuisine. 10 minutes away, Grand Case offers exceptional gastronomic choices.

access.title: How to Get There
access.description: Anse Marcel is accessible by a winding road from the main road. The bay is also accessible by boat. Princess Juliana Airport (SXM) is 25 minutes by car.

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: Unforgettable stays at Villa Lily Blue
reviews.review1: Beautiful villa with a breathtaking view! Everything was perfect: cleanliness, amenities, welcome. The pool is a real delight. We had a dream family vacation.
reviews.review2: Exceptional stay in this tastefully renovated villa. The kitchen is well-equipped, bedrooms spacious and air-conditioned. The location in Anse Marcel is ideal, close to everything but peaceful.
reviews.review3: We loved our week at Villa Lily Blue! The sea view from the terrace is incredible, especially at sunset. Very responsive concierge service. We'll be back!
reviews.review4: An upscale villa, decorated with elegance. Everything is designed for guest comfort. The heated pool is a real plus. Thank you for the warm welcome!
reviews.review5: Perfect vacation with our kids. The villa is secure, the pool is great, and Anse Marcel beach is 5 minutes away. The Grand Case restaurants are a must-visit.
reviews.review6: Second stay at Villa Lily Blue and still delighted! The villa has been completely renovated and it's beautiful. A true haven of peace with all modern comforts.

intro.title: Welcome to Saint Martin
intro.description: Saint Martin is a unique island in the world: peacefully shared between France (northern part) and the Netherlands (Sint Maarten, southern part) since 1648. This duality creates exceptional cultural, gastronomic and touristic richness on only 34 square miles.

frenchSide.title: French Side
frenchSide.description: The French part offers authentic charm with its picturesque villages, refined gastronomy and pristine beaches. Marigot, the capital, seduces with its colorful market and Creole architecture.

dutchSide.title: Dutch Side
dutchSide.description: Sint Maarten is known for its lively nightlife, casinos and the Maho Beach airport where planes fly just over the beach. Philipsburg offers duty-free shopping and international restaurants.

items.name: Anse Marcel
items.description: Our favorite bay! Calm waters, white sand, peaceful atmosphere.

items.name: Orient Bay
items.description: The liveliest beach with its beach bars and water sports.

items.name: Grand Case
items.description: Family beach in the gastronomic village of the island.

items.name: Happy Bay
items.description: Wild beach accessible only on foot, a well-kept secret.

items.name: Baie Rouge
items.description: Postcard scenery with its cliffs and golden sand.

items.name: Maho Beach
items.description: Famous for planes landing just overhead.

gastronomy.title: Gastronomy
gastronomy.description: Saint Martin is nicknamed the "Culinary Capital of the Caribbean". Grand Case, 10 minutes from Villa Lily Blue, has more than 50 restaurants offering French, Creole, Italian, Asian cuisine and much more.

activities.title: Activities & Excursions
